extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    Level 3 in a PHED, KINE, HLTH, DEVS or NURS Plan

basic.description: An investigation of current influences on sexual health. Issues will be considered from social, political and historical perspectives. Topics which may be covered include sex education; lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender issues; sexual human rights; sexuality and war; sexuality and globalization; HIV/AIDS; the history of marriage; and sexual violence.
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Contemporary Issues in Human Sexuality
